titleStmt.title: Territory of Washington v. Arthur Powell. Writ served to Sheriff

bibl.title: Territory of Washington v. Arthur Powell. Writ served to Sheriff
bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image of the microfilmed original.

msIdentifier.repository: Washington State Archives, Eastern Regional Branch
msIdentifier.collection: Spokane County Government; Clerk, Territorial Case Files, 1879-1889

div1.p:
The United States of America Territory of Washington To E.F. Whittier: The Sheriff of Spokane County Washington Territory:
This is to command you that you have the body of Arthur Powell by you imprisoned and detained as it is said before the District Court at the Territory of Washington for the 4th District thereof, holding terms at Cheney in Spokane County on the 5th day of May A.D. 1885 then and there to do and receive what shall be ordered concerning him, and have you then and there this writ thereof fail not under penalty of the law. By order at the Court.

Witness the Honorable George Turner Judge of the 4th Judicial District at the Territory of Washington with the seal of our said Court here unto attached.
Kate W. Feuerbach Clerk By R. Strobach Deputy
Territory of Washington Plff vs Arthur Powell Deft.
